text: For the 2019 Indian general election, Makkal Needhi Maiam's candidates for the Lok Sabha constituencies are as follows. ==Tamil Nadu (37)== After scrutiny by Election Commission of India, Makkal Needhi Maiam contested 37 lok sabha constituencies in Tamil Nadu.
